titleStmt.title: Un nuovo testimone altomedievale delle Recognitiones pseudo-clementine: i frammenti reperiti a Trento
Scripta: An International Journal of Codicology and Palaeography

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

analytic.title: Un nuovo testimone altomedievale delle Recognitiones pseudo-clementine: i frammenti reperiti a Trento

monogr.title: Scripta: An International Journal of Codicology and Palaeography

biblStruct.note: The front and back pastedowns in the incunable Trent, Biblioteca Fondazione S. Bernardino 32 preserve extracts from the Pseudo-Clementine Recognitiones. The article analyses and describes the codicological and palaeographical features of the fragments: their original manuscript was probably written in the 10th century in a northern-Italy scriptorium.

body.bibl: Frioli, Donatella. “Un Nuovo Testimone Altomedievale Delle Recognitiones Pseudo-Clementine: I Frammenti Reperiti a Trento.” Scripta: An International Journal of Codicology and Palaeography 6 (2013): 75–83.

Donatella Frioli, Un Nuovo Testimone Altomedievale Delle Recognitiones Pseudo-Clementine: I Frammenti Reperiti a Trento,” Scripta: An International Journal of Codicology and Palaeography 6 (2013): 75–83.
